Name: Beltex
About the game: Beltex is a game where you build factories. Extract numbers from the map Construct buildings that perform mathematical operations Lay down an expansive belt network Deliver numbers to core building to reach next level Build new production lines and reuse old ones Unlock new buildings and numbers Upgrade your buildings and belts to work faster Expand your factory across a huge hex map
